result.ga: An bhfuil mé chomh dona sin
result.orig: An bhfuil mé chomh dona sin
result.html: An bhfuil mé chomh dona sinAm I so bad?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil mé ċoṁ dona sinAm I so bad?

result.ga: Bhí a dtosca marachtála go dona
result.orig: Bhí a dtosca marachtála go dona
result.html: Bhí a dtosca marachtála go donaTheir living conditions were bad.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a dtosca maraċtála go donaTheir living conditions were bad.

result.eng: We were fighting against the bad weather.
result.ga: Bhí muid ag troid i gcoinne na drochaimsire
result.orig: Bhí muid ag troid i gcoinne na drochaimsire
result.html: Bhí muid ag troid i gcoinne na drochaimsireWe were fighting against the bad weather.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí muid ag troid i gcoinne na droċaimsireWe were fighting against the bad weather.

result.eng: The tour was cancelled because of bad weather.
result.ga: Cuireadh an turas ar ceal de bharr drochaimsire
result.orig: Cuireadh an turas ar ceal de bharr drochaimsire
result.html: Cuireadh an turas ar ceal de bharr drochaimsireThe tour was cancelled because of bad weather.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ an turas ar ceal de ḃarr droċaimsireThe tour was cancelled because of bad weather.

result.eng: However bad things are today, they could be worse tomorrow.
result.ga: Dá dhonacht rudaí inniu d'fhéadfaidís bheith níos measa amárach
result.orig: Dá dhonacht rudaí inniu d'fhéadfaidís bheith níos measa amárach
result.html: Dá dhonacht rudaí inniu d'fhéadfaidís bheith níos measa amárachHowever bad things are today, they could be worse tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Dá ḋonaċt rudaí inniu d'ḟéadfaidís ḃeiṫ níos measa amáraċHowever bad things are today, they could be worse tomorrow.

result.eng: However bad the unemployment rate in Ireland, it is worse in the Gaeltacht.
result.ga: Dá olcas an ráta dífhostaíochta in Éirinn is measa sa Ghaeltacht í
result.orig: Dá olcas an ráta dífhostaíochta in Éirinn is measa sa Ghaeltacht í
result.html: Dá olcas an ráta dífhostaíochta in Éirinn is measa sa Ghaeltacht íHowever bad the unemployment rate in Ireland, it is worse in the Gaeltacht.
result.ponchtml: Dá olcas an ráta díḟostaíoċta in Éirinn is measa sa Ġaeltaċt íHowever bad the unemployment rate in Ireland, it is worse in the Gaeltacht.

result.html: Is bocht an scéal éIt is bad news.
result.ponchtml: Is boċt an scéal éIt is bad news.

result.eng: Because of the bad weather, the tour was cancelled.
result.ga: Mar gheall ar an drochaimsir cuireadh an turas ar ceal
result.orig: Mar gheall ar an drochaimsir cuireadh an turas ar ceal
result.html: Mar gheall ar an drochaimsir cuireadh an turas ar cealBecause of the bad weather, the tour was cancelled.
result.ponchtml: Mar ġeall ar an droċaimsir cuireaḋ an turas ar cealBecause of the bad weather, the tour was cancelled.

result.html: Tá boladh bréan asIt smells bad.
result.ponchtml: Tá bolaḋ bréan asIt smells bad.

result.eng: It is a bad day. It's a miserable day.
result.html: Tá drochlá annIt is a bad day. It's a miserable day.
result.ponchtml: Tá droċlá annIt is a bad day. It's a miserable day.

result.eng: I have a bad pain there.
result.html: Tá drochphian orm ansinI have a bad pain there.
result.ponchtml: Tá droċṗian orm ansinI have a bad pain there.

result.eng: I'm not bad. [in aswer to 'how are you']
result.html: Níl caill ormI'm not bad. [in aswer to 'how are you']
result.ponchtml: Níl caill ormI'm not bad. [in aswer to 'how are you']

result.html: Níl sé ró-olcIt's not too bad.
result.ponchtml: Níl sé ró-olcIt's not too bad.

result.eng: It's bad of people to expect praise.
result.ga: Is olc an mhaise do dhaoine a bheith ag súil le moladh
result.orig: Is olc an mhaise do dhaoine a bheith ag súil le moladh
result.html: Is olc an mhaise do dhaoine a bheith ag súil le moladhIt's bad of people to expect praise.
result.ponchtml: Is olc an ṁaise do ḋaoine a ḃeiṫ ag súil le molaḋIt's bad of people to expect praise.

result.eng: It was bad of me not to give you advice.
result.ga: Ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibh
result.orig: Ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibh
result.html: Ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibhIt was bad of me not to give you advice.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċloíte an ṁaise dom é gan coṁairle a ṫaḃairt daoiḃIt was bad of me not to give you advice.

result.eng: It was bad of us not be grateful to him.
result.ga: Ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch de
result.orig: Ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch de
result.html: Ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch deIt was bad of us not be grateful to him.
result.ponchtml: Ba dona an ṁaise dúinn gan a ḃeiṫ buíoċ deIt was bad of us not be grateful to him.

result.html: Tá an drochshúil ortSomebody wishes you bad luck.
result.ponchtml: Tá an droċẛúil ortSomebody wishes you bad luck.

result.eng: And the bad news just kept on coming.
result.html: Agus níor stopadh den drochnuachtAnd the bad news just kept on coming.
result.ponchtml: Agus níor stopaḋ den droċnuaċtAnd the bad news just kept on coming.

result.eng: It is only now that things started to be bad in earnest.
result.ga: Ba mhaith riamh é go dtí seo
result.orig: Ba mhaith riamh é go dtí seo
result.html: Ba mhaith riamh é go dtí seoIt is only now that things started to be bad in earnest.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ riaṁ é go dtí seoIt is only now that things started to be bad in earnest.
